Raag Saarang − Part 001 1197 : 1 Raag Saarang, Chau−Padas, First Mehl, First House: 1197 : 2 One Universal Creator God. Truth Is The Name. Creative Being Personified. No Fear. No Hatred. Image Of The Undying. Beyond Birth. Self−Existent. By Guru's Grace: 1197 : 3 I am the hand−maiden of my Lord and Master. 1197 : 4 I have grasped the Feet of God, the Life of the world. He has killed and eradicated my egotism. ||1||Pause|| 1197 : 5 He is the Perfect, Supreme Light, the Supreme Lord God, my Beloved, my Breath of Life. 1197 : 6 The Fascinating Lord has fascinated my mind; contemplating the Word of the Shabad, I have come to understand. ||1|| 1197 : 7 The worthless self−willed manmukh, with false and shallow understanding − his mind and body are held in pain's grip. 1197 : 8 Since I came to be imbued with the Love of my Beautiful Lord, I meditate on the Lord, and my mind is encouraged. ||2|| 2

1197 : 9 Abandoning egotism, I have become detached. And now, I absorb true intuitive understanding. 1197 : 10 The mind is pleased and appeased by the Pure, Immaculate Lord; the opinions of other people are irrelevant. ||3|| 1197 : 11 There is no other like You, in the past or in the future, O my Beloved, my Breath of Life, my Support. 1197 : 12 The soul−bride is imbued with the Name of the Lord; O Nanak, the Lord is her Husband. ||4||1|| 1197 : 13 Saarang, First Mehl: 1197 : 14 How can I survive without the Lord? I am suffering in pain. 1197 : 15 My tongue does not taste − all is bland without the Lord's sublime essence. Without God, I suffer and die. ||1||Pause|| 1197 : 16 As long as I do not attain the Blessed Vision of my Beloved, I remain hungry and thirsty. 1197 : 17 Gazing upon the Blessed Vision of His Darshan, my mind is pleased and appeased. The lotus blossoms forth in the water. ||1|| Raag Saarang − Part 001 3

1197 : 18 The low−hanging clouds crack with thunder and burst. The cuckoos and the peacocks are filled with passion, 1197 : 19 along with the birds in the trees, the bulls and the snakes. The soul−bride is happy when her Husband Lord returns home. ||2|| 1197 : 20 She is filthy and ugly, unfeminine and ill−mannered − she has no intuitive understanding of her Husband Lord. 1197 : 21 She is not satisfied by the sublime essence of her Lord's Love; she is evil−minded, immersed in her pain. ||3|| 1197 : 22 The soul−bride does not come and go in reincarnation or suffer in pain; her body is not touched by the pain of disease. 1197 : 23 O Nanak, she is intuitively embellished by God; seeing God, her mind is encouraged. ||4||2|| 1197 : 24 Saarang, First Mehl: 1197 : 25 My Beloved Lord God is not far away. 1197 : 26 My mind is pleased and appeased by the Word of the True Guru's Teachings. I have found the Lord, the Support of my breath of life. ||1||Pause|| Raag Saarang − Part 001 4
−− Raag Saarang − Part 001 −− Raag Saarang − Part 001 5

Raag Saarang − Part 002 1198 : 27 This is the way to meet your Husband Lord. Blessed is the soul−bride who is loved by her Husband Lord. 1198 : 28 Social class and status, race, ancestry and skepticism are eliminated, following the Guru's Teachings and contemplating the Word of the Shabad. ||1|| 1198 : 29 One whose mind is pleased and appeased, has no egotistical pride. Violence and greed are forgotten. 1198 : 30 The soul−bride intuitively ravishes and enjoys her Husband Lord; as Gurmukh, she is embellished by His Love. ||2|| 1198 : 31 Burn away any love of family and relatives, which increases your attachment to Maya. 1198 : 32 One who does not savor the Lord's Love deep within, lives in duality and corruption. ||3|| 1198 : 33 His Love is a priceless jewel deep within my being; the Lover of my Beloved is not hidden. 1198 : 34 O Nanak, as Gurmukh, enshrine the Priceless Naam deep within your being, all the ages through. ||4||3|| 6

1198 : 35 Saarang, Fourth Mehl, First House: 1198 : 36 One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru: 1198 : 37 I am the dust of the feet of the humble Saints of the Lord. 1198 : 38 Joining the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, I have obtained the supreme status. The Lord, the Supreme Soul, is all−pervading everywhere. ||1||Pause|| 1198 : 39 Meeting the Saintly True Guru, I have found peace and tranquility. Sins and painful mistakes are totally erased and taken away. 1198 : 40 The Divine Light of the soul radiates forth, gazing upon the Presence of the Immaculate Lord God. ||1|| 1198 : 41 By great good fortune, I have found the Sat Sangat; the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, is all−prevading everywhere. 1198 : 42 I have taken my cleansing bath at the sixty−eight sacred shrines of pilgrimage, bathing in the dust of the feet of the True Congregation. ||2|| 1198 : 43 Evil−minded and corrupt, filthy−minded and shallow, with impure heart, attached to enticement and falsehood. Raag Saarang − Part 002 7

1198 : 44 Without good karma, how can I find the Sangat? Engrossed in egotism, the mortal remains stuck in regret. ||3|| 1198 : 45 Be kind and show Your Mercy, O Dear Lord; I beg for the dust of the feet of the Sat Sangat. 1198 : 46 O Nanak, meeting with the Saints, the Lord is attained. The Lord's humble servant obtains the Presence of the Lord. ||4||1|| 1198 : 47 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1198 : 48 I am a sacrifice to the Feet of the Lord of the Universe. 1198 : 49 I cannot swim across the terrifying world ocean. But chanting the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, I am carried across across. ||1||Pause|| 1198 : 50 Faith in God came to fill my heart; I serve Him intuitively, and contemplate Him. 1198 : 51 Night and day, I chant the Lord's Name within my heart; it is all−powerful and virtuous. ||1|| 1198 : 52 God is Inaccessible and Unfathomable, All−pervading everywhere, in all minds and bodies; He is Infinite and Invisible. Raag Saarang − Part 002 8

1198 : 53 When the Guru bebomes merciful, then the Unseen Lord is seen within the heart. ||2|| 1198 : 54 Deep within the inner being is the Name of the Lord, the Support of the entire earth, but to the egotistical shaakta, the faithless cynic, He seems far away. 1198 : 55 His burning desire is never quenched, and he loses the game of life in the gamble. ||3|| 1198 : 56 Standing up and sitting down, the mortal sings the Glorious Praises of the Lord, when the Guru bestows even a tiny bit of His Grace. 1198 : 57 O Nanak, those who are blessed by His Glance of Grace − He saves and protects their honor. ||4||2|| −− Raag Saarang − Part 002 −− Raag Saarang − Part 002 9

Raag Saarang − Part 003 1199 : 58 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1199 : 59 O my Beloved Lord, Har, Har, please bless me with Your Ambrosial Name. 1199 : 60 Those whose minds are pleased to be Gurmukh − the Lord completes their projects. ||1||Pause|| 1199 : 61 Those humble beings who become meek before the Guru−their pains are taken away. 1199 : 62 Night and day, they perform devotional worship services to the Guru; they are embellished with the Word of the Guru's Shabad. ||1|| 1199 : 63 Within their hearts is the ambrosial essence of the Naam, the Name of the Lord; they savor this essence, sing the praises of this essence, and contemplate this essence. 1199 : 64 By Guru's Grace, they are aware of this ambrosial essence; they find the Gate of Salvation. ||2|| 1199 : 65 The True is the Primal Being, Unmoving and Unchanging. One who takes the Support of the Naam, the Name of the Lord − his intellect becomes focused and steady. 10

1199 : 66 I offer my soul to Him; I am a sacrifice to my True Guru. ||3|| 1199 : 67 The self−willed manmukhs are stuck in doubt and attached to duality; the darkness of spiritual ignorance is within them. 1199 : 68 They do not see the True Guru, the Giver; they are not on this shore, or the other. ||4|| 1199 : 69 Our Lord and Master is permeating and pervading each and every heart; He is supremely Potent to exercise His Might. 1199 : 70 Nanak, the slave of His slaves, says, please, be merciful and save me! ||5||3|| 1199 : 71 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1199 : 72 This is the way to work for the Lord. 1199 : 73 Whatever He does, accept that as true. As Gurmukh, remain lovingly absorbed in His Name. ||1||Pause|| 1199 : 74 The Love of the Lord of the Universe seems supremely sweet. Everything else is forgotten. 1199 : 75 Raag Saarang − Part 003 11

Night and day, he is in ecstasy; his mind is pleased and appeased, and his light merges into the Light. ||1|| 1199 : 76 Singing the Glorious Praises of the Lord, his mind is satisfied. Peace and tranquility come to abide within his mind. 1199 : 77 When the Guru becomes merciful, the mortal finds the Lord; he focuses his consciousness on the Lord's Lotus Feet. ||2|| 1199 : 78 The intellect is enlightened, meditating on the Lord. He remains lovingly attuned to the essence of spiritual wisdom. 1199 : 79 The Divine Light radiates forth deep within his being; his mind is pleased and appeased. He merges intuitively into Celestial Samaadhi. ||3|| 1199 : 80 One whose heart is filled with falsehood, continues to practice falsehood, even while he teaches and preaches about the Lord. 1199 : 81 Within him is the utter darkness of greed. He is thrashed like wheat, and suffers in pain. ||4|| 1199 : 82 When my God is totally pleased, the mortal tunes in and becomes Gurmukh. 1199 : 83 Nanak has obtained the Immaculate Naam, the Name of the Lord. Chanting the Naam, he has found peace. ||5||4|| Raag Saarang − Part 003 12

1199 : 84 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1199 : 85 My mind is pleased and appeased by the Name of the Lord. 1199 : 86 The True Guru has implanted divine love within my heart. The Sermon of the Lord, Har, Har, is pleasing to my mind. ||1||Pause|| 1199 : 87 Please be merciful to Your meek and humble servant; please bless Your humble servant with Your Unspoken Speech. 1199 : 88 Meeting with the humble Saints, I have found the sublime essence of the Lord. The Lord seems so sweet to my mind and body. ||1|| 1199 : 89 They alone are unattached, who are imbued with the Lord's Love; through the Guru's Teachings, they realize the Naam, the Name of the Lord. 1199 : 90 Meeting with the Primal Being, one finds peace, and one's comings and goings in reincarnation are ended. ||2|| 1199 : 91 With my eyes, I gaze lovingly upon God, my Lord and Master. I chant His Name with my tongue. −− Raag Saarang − Part 003 −− Raag Saarang − Part 003 13

Raag Saarang − Part 004 1200 : 92 With my ears, I listen to the Kirtan of His Praises, day and night. I love the Lord, Har, Har, with all my heart. ||3|| 1200 : 93 When the Guru helped me to overcome the five thieves, then I found ultimate bliss, attached to the Naam. 1200 : 94 The Lord has showered His Mercy on servant Nanak; he merges in the Lord, in the Name of the Lord. ||4||5|| 1200 : 95 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1200 : 96 O my mind, chant the Name of the Lord, and study His Excellence. 1200 : 97 Without the Lord's Name, nothing is steady or stable. All the rest of the show is useless. ||1||Pause|| 1200 : 98 What is there to accept, and what is there to reject, O madman? Whatever is seen shall turn to dust. 1200 : 99 That poison which you believe to be your own − you must abandon it and leave it behind. What a load you have to carry on your head! ||1|| 14

1200 : 100 Moment by moment, instant by instant, your life is running out. The fool cannot understand this. 1200 : 101 He does things which will not go along with him in the end. This is the lifestyle of the faithless cynic. ||2|| 1200 : 102 So join together with the humble Saints, O madman, and you shall find the Gate of Salvation. 1200 : 103 Without the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, no one finds any peace. Go and ask the scholars of the Vedas. ||3|| 1200 : 104 All the kings and queens shall depart; they must leave this false expanse. 1200 : 105 O Nanak, the Saints are eternally steady and stable; they take the Support of the Name of the Lord. ||4||6|| 1200 : 106 Saarang, Fourth Mehl, Third House, Du−Padas: 1200 : 107 One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru: 1200 : 108 O son, why do you argue with your father? Raag Saarang − Part 004 15

1200 : 109 It is a sin to argue with the one who fathered you and raised you. ||1||Pause|| 1200 : 110 That wealth, which you are so proud of − that wealth does not belong to anyone. 1200 : 111 In an instant, you shall have to leave behind all your corrupt pleasures; you shall be left to regret and repent. ||1|| 1200 : 112 He is God, your Lord and Master − chant the Chant of that Lord. 1200 : 113 Servant Nanak spreads the Teachings; if you listen to it, you shall be rid of your pain. ||2||1||7|| 1200 : 114 Saarang, Fourth Mehl, Fifth House, Du−Padas, Partaal: 1200 : 115 One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru: 1200 : 116 O my mind, meditate on the Lord of the World, the Master of the Universe, the Life of the World, the Enticer of the mind; fall in love with Him. I take the Support of the Lord, Har, Har, Har, all day and all night. ||1||Pause|| 1200 : 117 Endless, endless, endless are the Praises of the Lord. Suk Dayv, Naarad and the gods like Brahma sing His Glorious Praises. Your Glorious Virtues, O my Lord and Master, cannot even be counted. Raag Saarang − Part 004 16

1200 : 118 O Lord, You are Infinite, O Lord, You are Infinite, O Lord, You are my Lord and Master; only You Yourself know Your Own Ways. ||1|| 1200 : 119 Those who are near, near to the Lord − those who dwell near the Lord − those humble servants of the Lord are the Holy, the devotees of the Lord. 1200 : 120 Those humble servants of the Lord merge with their Lord, O Nanak, like water merging with water. ||2||1||8|| −− Raag Saarang − Part 004 −− Raag Saarang − Part 004 17

Raag Saarang − Part 005 1201 : 121 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1201 : 122 O my mind, meditate on the Lord, the Lord, your Lord and Master. The Lord is the Most Divine of all the divine beings. Chant the Name of the Lord, Raam, Raam, the Lord, my most Dear Beloved. ||1||Pause|| 1201 : 123 That household, in which the Glorious Praises of the Lord are sung, in which the Glorious Praises of the Lord are sung, in which His Glorious Praises are sung, where the Panch Shabad, the Five Primal Sounds, resound − great is the destiny w 1201 : 124 All the sins of that humble being are taken away, all the pains are taken away, all diseases are taken away; sexual desire, anger, greed, attachment and egotistical pride are taken away. The Lord drives the five thieves out of such a person 1201 : 125 Chant the Name of the Lord, O Holy Saints of the Lord; meditate on the Lord of the Universe, O Holy people of the Lord. Meditate in thought, word and deed on the Lord, Har, Har. Worship and adore the Lord, O Holy people of the Lord. 1201 : 126 Chant the Name of the Lord, chant the Name of the Lord. It shall rid you of all your sins. 1201 : 127 Continually and continuously remain awake and aware. You shall be in ecstasy forever and ever, meditating on the Lord of the Universe. 1201 : 128 18

Servant Nanak: O Lord, Your devotees obtain the fruits of their minds' desires; they obtain all the fruits and rewards, and the four great blessings − Dharmic faith, wealth and riches, sexual success and liberation. ||2||2||9|| 1201 : 129 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1201 : 130 O my mind, meditate on the Lord, the Lord of Wealth, the Source of Nectar, the Supreme Lord God, the True Transcendent Being, God, the Inner−knower, the Searcher of hearts. 1201 : 131 He is the Destroyer of all suffering, the Giver of all peace; sing the Praises of my Beloved Lord God. ||1||Pause|| 1201 : 132 The Lord dwells in the home of each and every heart. The Lord dwells in the water, and the Lord dwells on the land. The Lord dwells in the spaces and interspaces. I have such a great longing to see the Lord. 1201 : 133 If only some Saint, some humble Saint of the Lord, my Holy Beloved, would come, to show me the way. 1201 : 134 I would wash and massage the feet of that humble being. ||1|| 1201 : 135 The Lord's humble servant meets the Lord, through his faith in the Lord; meeting the Lord, he becomes Gurmukh. 1201 : 136 My mind and body are in ecstasy; I have seen my Sovereign Lord King. Raag Saarang − Part 005 19

1201 : 137 Servant Nanak has been blessed with Grace, blessed with the Lord's Grace, blessed with the Grace of the Lord of the Universe. 1201 : 138 I meditate on the Lord, the Name of the Lord, night and day, forever, forever and ever. ||2||3||10|| 1201 : 139 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1201 : 140 O my mind, meditate on the Fearless Lord, 1201 : 141 who is True, True, Forever True. 1201 : 142 He is free of vengeance, the Image of the Undying, 1201 : 143 beyond birth, Self−existent. 1201 : 144 O my mind, meditate night and day on the Formless, Self−sustaining Lord. ||1||Pause|| 1201 : 145 For the Blessed Vision of the Lord's Darshan, for the Blessed Vision of the Lord's Darshan, the three hundred thirty million gods, and millions of Siddhas, celibates and Yogis make their pilgrimages to sacred shrines and rivers, and go on f Raag Saarang − Part 005 20

1201 : 146 The service of the humble person is approved, unto whom the Lord of the World shows His Mercy. ||1|| 1201 : 147 They alone are the good Saints of the Lord, the best and most exalted devotees, who are pleasing to their Lord. 1201 : 148 Those who have my Lord and Master on their side − O Nanak, the Lord saves their honor. ||2||4||11|| −− Raag Saarang − Part 005 −− Raag Saarang − Part 005 21

Raag Saarang − Part 006 1202 : 149 Saarang, Fourth Mehl, Partaal: 1202 : 150 O my mind, meditate on the Lord of the Universe, the Lord, the Lord of the Universe, the Treasure of Virtue, the God of all creation. O my mind, chant the Name of the Lord, the Lord, the Eternal, Imperishable, Primal Lord God. ||1||Pause|| 1202 : 151 The Name of the Lord is the Ambrosial Nectar, Har, Har, Har. He alone drinks it in, whom the Lord inspires to drink it. 1202 : 152 The Merciful Lord Himself bestows His Mercy, and He leads the mortal to meet with the True Guru. That humble being tastes the Ambrosial Name of the Lord, Har, Har. ||1|| 1202 : 153 Those who serve my Lord, forever and ever − all their pain, doubt and fear are taken away. 1202 : 154 Servant Nanak chants the Naam, the Name of the Lord, and so he lives, like the song−bird, which is satisfied only by drinking in the water. ||2||5||12|| 1202 : 155 Saarang, Fourth Mehl: 1202 : 156 O my mind, meditate on the Supreme Lord. 22

1202 : 157 The Lord, the Lord is All−pervading. 1202 : 158 True, True is the Lord. 1202 : 159 O Siblings of Destiny, chant the Name of the Lord, Raam, Raam, Raam, forever. He is All−pervading everywhere. ||1||Pause|| 1202 : 160 The Lord Himself is Himself the Creator of all. The Lord Himself is Himself pervading the whole world. 1202 : 161 That person, upon whom my Sovereign Lord King, Raam, Raam, Raam, bestows His Mercy − that person is lovingly attuned to the Lord's Name. ||1|| 1202 : 162 O Saints of the Lord, behold the Glory of the Name of the Lord; His Name saves the honor of His humble devotees in this Dark Age of Kali Yuga. 1202 : 163 My Sovereign Lord King has taken servant Nanak's side; his enemies and attackers have all run away. ||2||6||13|| 1202 : 164 Saarang, Fifth Mehl, Chau−Padas, First House: 1202 : 165 One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru: Raag Saarang − Part 006 23

1202 : 166 I am a sacrifice to the Image of the True Guru. 1202 : 167 My inner being is filled with a great thirst, like that of the song−bird for water. When shall I find the Fruitful Vision of His Darshan? ||1||Pause|| 1202 : 168 He is the Master of the masterless, the Cherisher of all. He is the Lover of the devotees of His Name. 1202 : 169 That mortal, whom no one can protect − You bless him with Your Support, O Lord. ||1|| 1202 : 170 Support of the unsupported, Saving Grace of the unsaved, Home of the homeless. 1202 : 171 Wherever I go in the ten directions, You are there with me. The only thing I do is sing the Kirtan of Your Praises. ||2|| 1202 : 172 From Your Oneness, You become tens of thousands, and from tens of thousands, You become One. I cannot describe Your state and extent. 1202 : 173 You are Infinite − Your value cannot be appraised. Everything I see is Your play. ||3|| 1202 : 174 I speak with the Company of the Holy; I am in love with the Holy people of the Lord. Raag Saarang − Part 006 24

1202 : 175 Servant Nanak has found the Lord through the Guru's Teachings; please bless me with Your Blessed Vision; O Lord, my mind yearns for it. ||4||1|| 1202 : 176 Saarang, Fifth Mehl: 1202 : 177 The Dear Lord is the Inner−knower, the Searcher of hearts. 1202 : 178 The mortal does evil deeds, and hides from others, but like the air, the Lord is present everywhere. ||1||Pause|| 1202 : 179 You call yourself a devotee of Vishnu and you practice the six rituals, but your inner being is polluted with greed. 1202 : 180 Those who slander the Society of the Saints, shall all be drowned in their ignorance. ||1|| −− Raag Saarang − Part 006 −− Raag Saarang − Part 006 25

Raag Saarang − Part 007 1203 : 181 The mortal eats the food which he has carefully prepared, and then steals the wealth of others. His inner being is filled with falsehood and pride. 1203 : 182 He knows nothing of the Vedas or the Shaastras; his mind is gripped by pride. ||2|| 1203 : 183 He says his evening prayers, and observes all the fasts, but this is all just a show. 1203 : 184 God made him stray from the path, and sent him into the wilderness. All his actions are useless. ||3|| 1203 : 185 He alone is a spiritual teacher, and he alone is a devotee of Vishnu and a scholar, whom the Lord God blesses with His Grace. 1203 : 186 Serving the True Guru, he obtains the supreme status and saves the whole world. ||4|| 1203 : 187 What can I say? I don't know what to say. As God wills, so do I speak. 1203 : 188 I ask only for the dust of the feet of the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. Servant Nanak seeks their Sanctuary. ||5||2|| 1203 : 189 26

Saarang, Fifth Mehl: 1203 : 190 Now, my dancing is over. 1203 : 191 I have intuitively obtained my Darling Beloved. Through the Word of the True Guru's Teachings, I found Him. ||1||Pause|| 1203 : 192 The virgin speaks with her friends about her husband and they laugh together; 1203 : 193 but when he comes home, she becomes shy, and modestly covers her face. ||1|| 1203 : 194 When gold is melted in the crucible, it flows freely everywhere. 1203 : 195 But when it is made into pure solid bars of gold, then it remains stationary. ||2|| 1203 : 196 As long as the days and the nights of one's life last, the clock strikes the hours, minutes and seconds. 1203 : 197 But when the gong player gets up and leaves, the gong is not sounded again. ||3|| 1203 : 198 When the pitcher is filled with water, the water contained within it seems distinct. Raag Saarang − Part 007 27

1203 : 199 Says Nanak, when the pitcher is emptied out, the water mingles again with water. ||4||3|| 1203 : 200 Saarang, Fifth Mehl: 1203 : 201 Now if he is asked, what can he say? 1203 : 202 He was supposed to have gathered the sublime essence of the Ambrosial Naam, the Name of the Lord, but instead, the mad−man was busy with poison. ||1||Pause|| 1203 : 203 This human life, so difficult to obtain, was finally obtained after such a long time. He is losing it in exchange for a shell. 1203 : 204 He came to buy musk, but instead, he has loaded dust and thistle grass. ||1|| 1203 : 205 He comes in search of profits, but he is entangled in the enticing illusion of Maya. 1203 : 206 He loses the jewel, in exchange for mere glass. When will he have this blessed opportunity again? ||2|| 1203 : 207 He is full of sins, and he has not even one redeeming virtue. Forsaking his Lord and Master, he is involved with Maya, God's slave. Raag Saarang − Part 007 28

1203 : 208 And when the final silence comes, like inanimate matter, he is caught like a thief at the door. ||3|| 1203 : 209 I cannot see any other way out. I seek the Sanctuary of the Lord's slaves. 1203 : 210 Says Nanak, the mortal is emancipated, only when all his demerits and faults are erased and eradicated. ||4||4|| 1203 : 211 Saarang, Fifth Mehl: 1203 : 212 O mother, my patience is gone. I am in love with my Husband Lord. 1203 : 213 There are so many kinds of incomparable pleasures, but I am not interested in any of them. ||1||Pause|| 1203 : 214 Night and day, I utter, "Pri−a, Pri−a − Beloved, Beloved" with my mouth. I cannot sleep, even for an instant; I remain awake and aware. 1203 : 215 Necklaces, eye make−up, fancy clothes and decorations − without my Husband Lord, these are all poison to me. ||1|| −− Raag Saarang − Part 007 −− Raag Saarang − Part 007 29

Raag Saarang − Part 008 1204 : 216 I ask and ask, with humility, "Who can tell me which country my Husband Lord lives in?" 1204 : 217 I would dedicate my heart to him, I offer my mind and body and everything; I place my head at his feet. ||2|| 1204 : 218 I bow at the feet of the voluntary slave of the Lord; I beg him to bless me with the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. 1204 : 219 Show Mercy to me, that I may meet God, and gaze upon the Blessed Vision of His Darshan every moment. ||3|| 1204 : 220 When He is Kind to me, He comes to dwell within my being. Night and day, my mind is calm and peaceful. 1204 : 221 Says Nanak, I sing the Songs of Joy; the Unstruck Word of the Shabad resounds within me. ||4||5|| 1204 : 222 Saarang, Fifth Mehl: 1204 : 223 O mother, True, True True is the Lord, and True, True, True is His Holy Saint. 30

1204 : 224 The Word which the Perfect Guru has spoken, I have tied to my robe. ||1||Pause|| 1204 : 225 Night and day, and the stars in the sky shall vanish. The sun and the moon shall vanish. 1204 : 226 The mountains, the earth, the water and the air shall pass away. Only the Word of the Holy Saint shall endure. ||1|| 1204 : 227 Those born of eggs shall pass away, and those born of the womb shall pass away. Those born of the earth and sweat shall pass away as well. 1204 : 228 The four Vedas shall pass away, and the six Shaastras shall pass away. Only the Word of the Holy Saint is eternal. ||2|| 1204 : 229 Raajas, the quality of energetic activity shall pass away. Taamas, the quality of lethargic darkness shall pass away. Saatvas, the quality of peaceful light shall pass away as well. 1204 : 230 All that is seen shall pass away. Only the Word of the Holy Saint is beyond destruction. ||3|| 1204 : 231 He Himself is Himself by Himself. All that is seen is His play. 1204 : 232 He cannot be found by any means. O Nanak, meeting with the Guru, God is found. ||4||6|| Raag Saarang − Part 008 31

1204 : 233 Saarang, Fifth Mehl: 1204 : 234 The Guru, the Lord of the Universe, dwells within my mind. 1204 : 235 Wherever my Lord and Master is remembered in meditation − that village is filled with peace and bliss. ||1||Pause|| 1204 : 236 Wherever my Beloved Lord and Master is forgotten − all misery and misfortune is there. 1204 : 237 Where the Praises of my Lord, the Embodiment of Bliss and Joy are sung − eternal peace and wealth are there. ||1|| 1204 : 238 Wherever they do not listen to the Stories of the Lord with their ears − the utterly desolate wilderness is there. 1204 : 239 Where the Kirtan of the Lord's Praises are sung with love in the Saadh Sangat − there is fragrance and fruit and joy in abundance. ||2|| 1204 : 240 Without meditative remembrance on the Lord, one may live for millions of years, but his life would be totally useless. 1204 : 241 But if he vibrates and meditates on the Lord of the Universe, for even a moment, then he shall live forever and ever. ||3|| Raag Saarang − Part 008 32

1204 : 242 O God, I seek Your Sanctuary, Your Sanctuary, Your Sanctuary; please mercifully bless me with the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. 1204 : 243 O Nanak, the Lord is All−pervading everywhere, amongst all. He knows the qualities and the condition of all. ||4||7|| 1204 : 244 Saarang, Fifth Mehl: 1204 : 245 Now, I have obtained the Support of the Lord. 1204 : 246 Those who seek the Sanctuary of the Ocean of Mercy are carried across the world−ocean. ||1||Pause|| 1204 : 247 They sleep in peace, and intuitively merge into the Lord. The Guru takes away their cynicism and doubt. 1204 : 248 Whatever they wish for, the Lord does; they obtain the fruits of their minds' desires. ||1|| 1204 : 249 In my heart, I meditate on Him; with my eyes, I focus my meditation on Him. With my ears, I listen to His Sermon. −− Raag Saarang − Part 008 −− Raag Saarang − Part 008 33

Raag Saarang − Part 009 1205 : 250 With my feet, I walk on my Lord and Mater's Path.
